document_data.caption: A map showing Black Cat Way and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Black Cat Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Black Cat Way'''<ref group="note">The [[Forgotten Realms Interactive Atlas]] has this street mislabeled as "Black Cart Way." was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Black Cat Way was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road branched south off of the southwest side of [[Golden Serpent Street]] just south of the intersection with [[Undal's Lane]] and [[Downybeard Tobacconist]]. Black Cat way passed southeast before turning sharply east at its southern end to merge with [[Sammarin's Street]]. Unnamed alleys branched off both the east and west sides of Black Cat Way.
